text: Microbacterium pygmaeum is a Gram-positive, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Microbacterium which has been isolated from soil from the Aoyama Cemetery in Tokyo in Japan. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Microbacterium pygmaeum at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2008 Category:Micrococcineae
title: Microbacterium pygmaeum
